name: From TV Animation One Piece: Maboroshi no Grand Line Boukenki!
overview: One Piece: Maboroshi no Grand Line Bōkenki! is a role-playing game based on the mange One Piece. It goes through the story from Loguetown to the islands on the Grand Lines. It includes multiple of the original characters. The turn-based battle system includes an adrenaline gauge and once filled it can be used for special moves.
